title: The Ultimate Guide to Full-Body Workouts
author: Alex Carter
paragraphs: Discover exercises that target every muscle group, helping you build strength and endurance. Perfect for beginners and seasoned gym-goers alike.

authorBio:
With over a decade of experience in the fitness industry, Alex specializes in strength training and
functional fitness. Certified by NASM and known for his motivational style, Alex designs workout
programs that are both challenging and achievable. His passion lies in helping clients build strength and
confidence through personalized routines. Outside the gym, Alex is an avid runner and enjoys
outdoor adventures.
